about_the_game:
Alert, alert! New tiles to increase the military presence in your game are here thanks to the CyberCity Central Security pack! PVGames is back with another pack in their CyberCity series, this time focusing on cold concrete and metal to create a harsh technology-filled world for your heroes to fight for or against. More than 1,800 tiles are ready to help you build long hallways where your heroes need to avoid cameras and barricades, jail cells where your heroes may make unlikely connections, barracks for the city’s soldiers, and more!

Perfect for parallax mapping, each object in this pack comes in 8 different directions so you can set up your maps exactly how you imagine them. If your game needs some dangerous military bases to sneak into or you want to show just how deadly the corrupt city’s soldiers are, check out the CyberCity Central Security pack!

Contents:

* Interior building pieces (floors, walls, stairs, etc)
* Exterior buildings
* Brutalist concrete structures
* Massive weaponry including large cannons and missile batteries
* War room tiles and gadgets
* Barriers and hedgehogs
* Barracks tiles
* Brig/detention facility tiles
* Computers, terminals, and computer assemblies
* A variety of containers, barrels, etc
* Explosive devices
* Flags, lamp posts, spotlights, flood lights, sandbags, and other accessories
* Fort walls, watchtowers, and turrets
* Garbage, pallets, and other clutter
* Generators and power supplies
* A mobile armory
* Security scanners and other security devices
* And more!

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
